name: Grapple Planet VR
description:
This is a tech demo we built about a year ago.  We could never figure out how to make it into a full game, so we're releasing it here for free for all to enjoy.

In Grapple Planet, you're given a grapple gun in each hand, and you're thrown into a scaled-down model of our Solar System.  Every planet is orbited by hundreds of asteroids, and you'll have to aim your grapple gun carefully to reel yourself between them and traverse the system.  Can you make it to the outer planets?

Warning: Extreme Risk of Motion Sickness.  Travelling in Zero-G with no down is highly disorienting.

Built for HTC Vive with SteamVR and Unity3D.

Tips:

Pull the trigger slightly to get a laser guide that lights up blue when your aim is true.

Use the utility buttons on your controllers to slow down or speed up time.
